inclusion.criterion: Patients must have histologically confirmed diagnosis of WHO grade IV primary malignant glioma (glioblastoma multiforme or gliosarcoma).
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, not glioblastoma multiforme or gliosarcoma.

inclusion.criterion: Patients have to be within 6 weeks of the last major surgical procedure.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about recent surgery

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is a 45-year-old man, so age is met.

inclusion.criterion: An interval of at least 2 weeks and not > 6 weeks between prior major surgical procedure and study enrollment.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about recent surgery

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has chronic pain, but no information suggests Karnofsky score is < 60.

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about hemoglobin level

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about platelet count

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about serum creatinine level

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent approved by the Institutional Review Board.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has undergone multiple treatments, so likely signed informed consent.

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about pregnancy or breastfeeding

exclusion.criterion: Co-medication that may interfere with study results; e.g. immuno-suppressive agents other than corticosteroids.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient is on high-dose steroids, but no other immunosuppressants mentioned.

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with radiotherapy or chemotherapy for a brain tumor, irrespective of the grade of the tumor.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has undergone radiation and temozolomide for anaplastic astrocytoma

exclusion.criterion: Inadequately controlled hypertension (defined as systolic blood pressure > 150 and/or diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg).
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about blood pressure

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, which is not the same as glioblastoma multiforme or gliosarcoma. Patient has undergone radiation and chemotherapy for their tumor, which may trigger exclusion criteria.
